title: Looking for people to mess around in normals or ranked maybe
body:
Still haven't done placements for this season, but has been silver for the last 3 reasons
I only know supports so please be gentle.

IGN: Heart Democracy

replies.body: I am happy to play if you dont mind playing with a bronze player.
what elo are you? I am just bronze 4, hence not that good. Am happy to give it a go. Am a decent adc at my elo.
I can't check my mmr since i only played 2 ranked games this season, but i was silver 1 in season 4.
